descriptions.content:
This particle is used to form the first person plural imperative: the exhortative.

  • ཕེབས་དོ། “Let’s go.”
  • བཞུགས་དོ། “Let’s sit down.”

Apart from དོ་, which is used to form the first person imperative, the other imperative markers all indicate the second person singular or plural imperative, and differ from one another only in terms of nuance or register.
